data.title: Joanna Lumley and her husband face the music
data.meta_description: They have been married for almost 40 years, but there are still questions that Dame Joanna Lumley wants to ask her husband, the composer and conductor Stephen B
data.text:
They have been married for almost 40 years, but there are still questions that Dame Joanna Lumley wants to ask her husband, the composer and conductor Stephen Barlow.

The 76-year-old star of Absolutely Fabulous and Barlow, 68, share a passion for classical music but she said they “hardly ever have the luxury of having time just to sit and talk about it” — until now. The couple are launching a podcast, Joanna & the Maestro, on Tuesday, in which they will discuss everything from Richard Wagner’s Das Rheingold and the music that shaped their childhoods to their long and happy marriage.
